author: waredjeb
body:
- This PR introduces the possibility to generate particles with a uniform eta distribution.
- if the `ControlledByEta` flag is `True`, eta is generated in the range `[MinEta,MaxEta]` and R is computed from eta. Otherwise, the generation is controlled by R and R is sampled in the range `[RMin, RMax]` 
- this PR also fixes a bug introduced by #36460
   - https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36460/files#diff-40127cfb5d2379d718d6b82ffc0d5e900b6eeb1bae875f44fa81f63655e06365R84 `PartID` should be taken randomly from `fPartIDs`, instead was sampled between [0, `fPardIDs.size()`].
title: [HGCAL] Closeby Particle gun - uniform eta generation
